EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings,
Thank you for reaching out to YETI. We are excited to let you know your event has been approved for the YETI Fundraising Program. At this time, you can enjoy a 40% discount on select YETI product with sales tax added to your order. Please note there is a $340.00 order minimum (after applying discounts and before tax).
When you are ready to place your order, please give us a call at 512-394-9384 and a member of the Fundraising Team can help you get your order placed. We look forward to working with you!
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
